code: import{ADD_STAT,RESET_STATS,ADD_STAT_POINT,REMOVE_STAT_POINT}from"./stats.types";export var addStat=function addStat(stat){return{type:ADD_STAT,payload:{stat:stat}};};export var addStatPoint=function addStatPoint(stat){return{type:ADD_STAT_POINT,payload:{stat:stat}};};export var removeStatPoint=function removeStatPoint(stat){return{type:REMOVE_STAT_POINT,payload:{stat:stat}};};export var resetStats=function resetStats(){return{type:RESET_STATS,payload:{}};};
